maqras.text: ye log kis cheez ke baare mein poch gach kar rahe hai
us badi qabar ke mutaalliq
jis ke baare mein ye eqtelaaf kar rahe hai
yaqinan ye abhi jaan lenge
phir bil yaqeen unhe bahuth jald maaloom ho jayega
kya hum ne zameen ko farsh nahi banaya
aur pahaado ko meqe (nahi banaya)
aur hum ne tumhe joda joda paida kiya
aur hum ne tumhaari neend ko araam ka sabab banaya
aur raath ko hum ne parda banaya hai
aur din ko hum ne waqt rozgaar banaya
aur tumhaare upar hum ne saath mazbooth asmaan banaaye
aur ek chamakta hoa roushan chiraagh (suraj) paida kiya
aur badhliyo se hum ne ba kasrath behta hoa paani barsaaya
ta ke us se anaaj aur sabza ugaaye
aur ghane baagh (bhi ugaaye)
beshak faisle ke din ka waqth muqarrar hai
jis din ke soor mein phuka jayega, phir tum fauj dar fauj chale aoge
aur asmaan khol diya jayega, to us mein darwaaze darwaaze ho jayenge
aur pahaad chalaaye jayenge, pas wo saraab1 ho jayenge
beshak dozakh ghaath mein hai
sarkasho ka thikaana wahi hai
us mein wo muddato tak pade rahenge
na kabhi us mein khanki ka maza chakenge na paani ka
sivaaye garam paani aur (behti) peep ke
(un ko) pura pura badhla milega
unhe to hisaab ki tawaqqe hee na thi
aur be baaki se hamaari aayato ki takzeeb karte thein
hum ne har ek cheez ko likh kar shumaar kar rakha hai
ab tum (apne kiye ka) maza chako, hum tumhaara azaab hee badaate rahenge
yaqinan parhezgaar logo ke liye kamyaabi hai
baghaath hai aur angoor hai
aur nau jawaan kuwaari hum umr aurte hai
aur chalakte hoye jaam sharaab hai
wahaa na to wo be huda baatein sunenge aur na jhoti batein sunenge
(un ko) tere rab ki taraf se (un ke nek amaal ka) ye badhla milega jo kaafi inaam hoga

(us rab ki taraf se milega jo ke) asmaano ka aur zameen ka aur jo kuch un ke darmiyaan hai, un ka parvardigaar hai aur badi baqshish karne waala hai, kisi ko us se baath cheeth karne ka eqtiyaar nahi hoga
jis din ruh aur farishte sa-fe baandh kar khade honge, to koyi kalaam na kar sakega, magar jise rahmaan ijaazath de de aur wo theek baath zabaan se nikaale
ye din haq hai, ab jo chaahe apne rab ke paas (nek amaal kar ke) thikaana bana le
hum ne tumhe an-qareeb aane waale azaab se dara diya (aur chaukanna kar diya) hai, jis din insaan apne haatho ki kamaayi ko dekh lega aur kaafir kahega ke kaash! main mitthi ho jaata
doob kar saqti se khinchne waalo ki qasam
bandh khol kar chohda dene waalo ki qasam
aur teerne phirne waalo ki qasam
phir daud kar aage badne waalo ki qasam
phir kaam ki tadhbeer karne waalo ki qasam
jis din kaampne wali kaampegi
us ke baadh ek piche aane waali, piche piche ayegi
(bahuth se) dil us din dhadakte honge
jin ki nigaahe nichi hongi
kehte hai ke kya hum pehle ki si haalath ki taraf lautaaye jayenge
kya us waqt, jab ke hum bosida haddiyaa ho jaayenge
kehte hai ke phir to ye lautna nuqsaandah hai
(maloom hona chahiye) wo to sirf ek (khauf naak) daant hai
ke (jis ke zaaher hote hee) wo ek dam maidaan mein jama ho jayenge
kya Mosa(alaihissallaam) ki qabar tumhe pahonchi hai
jab ke unhe un ke rab ne paak maidaan tua mein pukaara
(ke) tum feraun ke paas jaao, us ne sarkashi eqtiyaar karli hai
us se kaho ke kya to apni durustgi aur islaah chahta hai
aur ye ke main tujhe tere rab ki raah dikhaao, ta ke tu (us se) darne lage
pas ose badi nishaani dikhaayi
to us ne jhutlaaya aur na farmaani ki
phir palta daud dhoop karte hoye
phir sab ko jama kar ke pukaara
tum sab ka rab main hee hoon
to (sab se bulandh wa baala) Allah ne bhi ose aaqirath ke aur dunya ke azaab mein giraftaar kar liya
beshak is mein us shaqs ke liye ibrath hai jo da-re
kya tumhaara paida karna zyaada dushwaar hai ya asmaan ka? Allah taâ€™ala ne ose banaya
us ki bulandi oonchi ki, phir ose theek thaak kar diya
us ki raath ko tareek banaaya aur us ke din ko nikaala
aur us ke baadh zameen ko hamwaar bhicha diya
us mein se paani aur chaara nikaala
aur pahaado ko (mazbooth) gaad diya
ye sab tumhaare aur tumhaare jaanwaro ke fayde ke liye hai
pas jab wo badi aafath (qayaamath) aa jayegi
jis din ke insaan apne kiye hoye kaamo ko yaad karega
aur (har) dekhne waale ke saamne jahannam zaaher ki jayegi
to jis (shaqs) ne sarkashi ki (hogi)
aur dunyaawi zindagi ko tarjih di (hogi)
us ka thikaana jahannam hee hai
haan jo shaqs apne rab ke saamne khade hone se darta raha hoga aur apne nafs ko qaahish se roka hoga
to us ka thikaana jannath hee hai
log aap se qayaamath ke waaqe hone ka waqt daryaaft karte hai
aap ko us ke bayaan karne se kya talluq
us ke ilm ki inteha to Allah ki jaanib hai
aap to sirf us se darte rehne waalo ko agaah karne waale hai
jis roz ye ose dekh lenge, to aisa maloom hoga ke sirf din ka aaqri hissa ya awwal hissa hee (dunya mein) rahe hai
